summary: Implements a Stable Diffusion pipeline enhanced with Self‑Attention Guidance (SAG). It orchestrates model loading, text encoding, latent diffusion, cross‑attention caching, and optional safety checking, while supporting extensions such as LoRA, IP‑Adapter, and textual inversion.
business_intent: Enable developers to generate high‑quality text‑to‑image content using Stable Diffusion with advanced attention‑based guidance, facilitating creative applications, rapid prototyping, and integration into commercial image‑generation services.
